attributes.action: Remove barriers in the lewisham Borough because of major traffic.
attributes.additional_details: When the back streets were open to cars in the lewisham Borough there wasn't traffic this bad. If theres an accident on the south circular now there won't be anywhere for traffic to go now. This is really not going to work.
attributes.background:
To get in contact with lewisham Council to
remove the barriers on lewisham Borough back streets because of major traffic on the south circular in both direction. Its much worse and at a stand still every morning.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Lewisham Council also have their own petition system: https://lewisham.gov.uk/mayorandcouncil/influence/submit-or-view-a-petition
